name: ZipList

unions.name: ZipList
unions.comment: A collection data type that can be moved forward/backward and that exposes a current element (see the `current` function)

values.name: current
values.comment: Return the current element of a ZipList. `Nothing` will be returned if the ziplist is empty

values.name: fromList
values.comment: Craft a new ZipList out of a List

values.name: singleton
values.comment: Create a new ZipList with a single element in it
